full_text:
For the Louisiana advocate of the French language, see Richard Guidryl for another Louisiana state representative, see Jesse J. Guidry.
Richard P. Guidry, known as Dick Guidry  was a businessman from Galliano, Louisiana, who was a Democrat former member of the Louisiana House of Representatives from Lafourche Parish. He is considered the youngest member ever elected to the Louisiana House.
^ "Membership in the Louisiana House of Representatives, 1812-2016" . house.louisiana.gov. Retrieved May 22, 2014.
title: Dick Guidry
